bug.short_desc: Missing media type for font files

long_desc.thetext: Just found a problem with the EPUB specification which does not allow TTF fonts as it's not a core media type. This causes the EPUB validation to barf when such fonts are present. The validator should instead issue a warning as this font type is fairly common and one cannot expect a fallback to be presented. See http://www.daisy.org/epub/issues/missing-media-type-font-files
